name: Appcessorize
summary: Appcessorize is a simple library that lets users make their photos into phone cases.
description: Appcessorize is a simple library that lets users make their photos into phone cases. By integrating it in your application, your users will be able to get a real mobile case anywhere in the world. It is so easy: select images, add them to the case template, check out and **YOU ARE DONE!!**
